item.title: PicoCTF 2019 - General Skills
item.author: shiny-labs@kylma.fr (shiny-labs)
item.description: Let’s Warm Up [50] Description If I told you a word started with 0x70 in hexadecimal, what would it start with in ASCII? Solution A look at the ASCII manual should help! $ man ascii Then, it’s just a matter of finding the right line, the one that has 70 in the Hex column. Oct Dec Hex Char Oct Dec Hex Char ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── [...] 060 48 30 0 160 112 70 p Flag: picoCTF{p}
